column1: 1.Critical Stage Verification: Trim & Draft Status Sequence

column2: Arrival condition (lightship). Check initial drafts and trim.
TR1 roll-on start: 1st axle on ramp. Initial trim change (bow down).
TR1 mid-ramp: cargo COG on ramp. Progressive bow down, within limits.
TR1 on deck: full weight transferred to vessel deck. Verify deck & ramp condition.
TR1 secured at Fr.42 (aft). Drafts back to baseline; ready for D-1 pre-ballasting.
[D-1] Pre-ballast using shore water. Set intentional trim for TR2 bow moment. No major dynamic ballasting during RORO.
[D-day] TR2 ramp entry under fixed pre-ballast condition. Check critical drafts/trim without additional pumping.
Final stowage with both TRs secured. Confirm departure stability based on pre-ballast distribution.
Departure / reference condition after completion of RORO sequence.
